base_description: Wall-mounted faucet set, metallic, modern style.
part_description: Includes a central spout and two handles; all cylindrical.
internal_interaction_description: The handles control water flow through the spout, each handle adjusting either hot or cold water. The internal valves open or close to regulate water pressure and temperature, ensuring a smooth and controlled water output from the spout.
external_interaction_description: Installed on a wall above a sink, the faucet allows users to turn the handles to mix hot and cold water, directing it through the spout into the sink. It's designed for easy cleaning and complements modern bathroom or kitchen decor.
